Documentation.short_help: PassThrough filter from the Point Cloud Library (PCL).

StringVectorProperty.name: FieldName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the field (PCL point type attribute, e.g. "x", "y", "z", "r", "g", "b") to which the filter will be applied. The present fields will be determined by the input data.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Limits
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the limits of the filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: Invert
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Invert the filter. If set, the filter will remove points within the limits.
